name: Restaurant Services, Inc.
description: Restaurant Services, Inc. is a leading provider of supply chain solutions and logistics services specifically tailored for the foodservice industry. Founded in 1995, the company has established itself as a trusted partner for restaurants, catering companies, and institutional foodservice providers. RSSL specializes in sourcing, procurement, and distribution of a wide array of products, including food, beverages, and disposable supplies. Their comprehensive suite of services encompasses inventory management, warehousing, and transportation logistics, allowing clients to streamline operations and reduce costs. With a commitment to quality and sustainability, RSSL works closely with suppliers to ensure that clients receive high-quality products while minimizing their environmental impact. The company's innovative technology solutions facilitate real-time tracking and management of inventory, providing clients with valuable insights to optimize their supply chain. RSSL is dedicated to enhancing the efficiency of its customers' operations, enabling them to focus on their core business of delivering exceptional dining experiences. With a strong emphasis on customer service and relationship building, Restaurant Services, Inc. continues to expand its footprint in the growing foodservice market.
